channel.title: Comments on: Conservative observations
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Steve Brizel
item.dc:creator: Steve Brizel
item.description: As someone with small town roots, there is no doubt that Centrist Orthodoxy has focused on self preservation from the twin evils of kids going off the derech and flipping out, while Charedi yeshivos and community kollelim as well as Chabad have become the forces to be reckoned with in projecting Orthodoxy beyond the citadels of MO. It is indeed a shame that MO has essentially forfeited its right and duty to project its message to the unaffiliated and unlettered masses of American Jews.
item.content:encoded: As someone with small town roots, there is no doubt that Centrist Orthodoxy has focused on self preservation from the twin evils of kids going off the derech and flipping out, while Charedi yeshivos and community kollelim as well as Chabad have become the forces to be reckoned with in projecting Orthodoxy beyond the citadels of MO. It is indeed a shame that MO has essentially forfeited its right and duty to project its message to the unaffiliated and unlettered masses of American Jews.
